Name: FLTR-XL Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)

Extraction Rate: -30%
Inert Materials: -20%

Reduce the amount inert material collected from deposits with the FLTR-XL Module. Though the extraction rate will slow considerably, the FLTR-XL's patented filtration system screens out inert material to leave more storage space for valuable ore.
